name: I Wanna Be The Beetle
description:
There are some added hotkeys:

P - Pause

F2 - Menu

Escape - A bit of a surprise :)

If you have any questions about the assets or music in this game (or the game itself), just write a comment or something.

Patch notes (1.1):

- Collisions have been made a lot less janky

- The groundcheck no longer bugs out when you are on the very edge of a platform
